attributes.action: Investigate a conflict of interest by QC's involved the 'Leave' High Court case.
attributes.background: to ensure fairness and ensure the Democratic right of the 17.5 million people who voted to leave in the refrendum are represented fairly

rejection.details:
Complaints about the conduct of judges are investigated by the Judicial Conduct and Investigations Office (JCIO). You can find out how to make a complaint here:

http://judicialconduct.judiciary.gov.uk/

Complaints about the conduct of barristers are investigated by the Bar Standards Board. You can find out how to make a complaint here:

https://www.barstandardsboard.org.uk/complaints-and-professional-conduct/
